formElement.label: Configuration name:
formElement.documentation: The name of the configuration that contains the user and password to connect to the database server.

formElement.label: Query:
formElement.documentation: Provide any query you want to run against the database.

formElement.label: Psql path:
formElement.documentation: Absolute path to the psql utility.

formElement.label: Server:
formElement.documentation: The name/ip of the server you want to connect to.

formElement.label: Output file:
formElement.documentation: Name of a file to store output (without extension)

formElement.label: SQL file path:
formElement.documentation: Absolute path to a sql file.

formElement.label: Working directory:
formElement.documentation: Sets the directory where the command will be executed

formElement.label: Result (output property path):
formElement.documentation: Property name used to store the result of queries.
